page.title: 12CHURCH OF ENGLAND
page.content:
There are three Church of England Churches in this area: All Saints, Huthwaite St.Werburgha's, Blackwell St.Mark's, Fulwood
At St.Werburgha's the Sunday services are Parish Communion (ASB Rite B), Family Service and Sunday School in the morning and Evensong (1662, BCP). The vicar is Rev.Andrew P.Berry.
At All Saints' the Sunday services are Parish Communion (ASB Rite A) and Evening Prayer (ASB). Mr.Oliver, the vicar, has just moved to become a tutor at St.John's College, Nottingham.
St.Mark's, Fulwood is a tin mission church served by the vicar of Sutton.
